layout.singingstanza: If I go to the meet -- ing, But shy a -- way from speak -- ing, There's no life that's re -- leas -- ing Of my lov -- ing Christ. Let's not quench the Spir -- it, But take heed to say, Let's not quench the Spir -- it, But fan it in -- to flame By call -- ing "Oh Lord Je -- sus"! Let's speak your word to -- day! We can grow in life di -- vine With -- out fluc -- tu -- a -- tion! We can grow in life di -- vine, Dis -- ci -- pling the na -- tion!

lyrics.stanza: If I go to the meeting, But shy away from speaking, There's no life that's releasing Of my loving Christ.

Let's not quench the Spirit, But take heed to say, Let's not quench the Spirit, But fan it into flame By calling "Oh Lord Jesus"! Let's speak your word today! We can grow in life divine Without fluctuation! We can grow in life divine, Discipling the nation!
Though a brother is speaking, Am I closed to receiving? Why won't I just be open; Be filled and say "Amen"!
